title: Emma Stone indulges in some retail therapy with a pal in Primrose Hill
text:
She's been busy filming scenes for Disney's live action edition 101 Dalmatians, where she will play infamous villainess Cruella de Vil.

But Emma Stone enjoyed a brief break from the movie as she indulged in some retail therapy at Primrose Hill's Space NK, before visiting a British pub with a pal in north London on Monday afternoon.

The Superbad actress, 30, displayed her naturally radiant complexion as she went make-up free for the low-key outing.

Time off: Emma Stone enjoyed a break from filming Cruella as she indulged in some retail therapy at Primrose Hill's Space NK, before visiting a pub with a pal in London on Monday

Nailing autumnal chic, the screen star looked effortlessly stylish in a mustard turtleneck jumper, a navy denim coat and skinny jeans.

The Arizona native maintained her trendy display in the accessory department as she sported an all-black baseball cap, and boosted her frame in classic Chelsea boots.

Cruella, which is slated for a May 2021 release, is directed by the man behind Oscar-nominated film I, Tonya — Craig Gillespie.

Less is more: The Superbad actress, 30, displayed her naturally radiant complexion as she went make-up free for the low-key outing

Off she goes: Nailing autumnal chic, the screen star looked effortlessly stylish in a mustard turtleneck jumper, a navy denim coat and skinny jeans

Low-key: The Arizona native maintained her trendy display in the accessory department as she sported an all-black baseball cap, and boosted her frame in classic Chelsea boots

Based on 1956 novel The Hundred and One Dalmatians, the film is set in the English capital in the 1970s.

Disney's Cruella tells the story of a wealthy fashion designer who develops a penchant for Dalmatian skin and aims to turn 99 Dalmatian puppies into a fur coat.

The screen star recently revealed her storyline comes in to play during Cruella's younger years - before Glenn Close's portrayal in the 1996 version of 101 Dalmatians.

Portrayal: She's been busy filming scenes for Disney's live action edition 101 Dalmatians, where she will play infamous villainess Cruella de Vil (pictured filming earlier this month)

'It's pretty trippy. It's wild,' she said of her role in the movie before adding she walks around set thinking 'this is bananas.'

When asked about iconic actress Glenn, 72, she added to to Entertainment Tonight: 'I think she's obviously the GOAT (greatest of all time), but I also have just loved the cartoon for a really long time.'

The film is also set to star the likes of Emma Thompson as Baroness and Paul Walter Hauser as Horace, as well as Kirby Howell-Baptiste and Emily Beecham.
description: The Superbad actress, 30, enjoyed a brief break from the movie as she indulged in some retail therapy at Primrose Hill's Space NK, before visiting a British pub with a pal in north London on Monday.
